pageProduct.name: Voost Hydrate Apple + Berry Effervescent Tablets 60 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

VOOST Electrolyte Hydrate Apple + Berry helps relieve symptoms of dehydration. Support body electrolyte balance and restore body electrolyte balance after exercise.

Suitable For: Vegan friendly.

Product Claims: No added dairy, lactose, soy or yeast.

Size: 60 Tablets

Flavour: Apple + Berry

Warnings

Each tablet contains 77mg of potassium. If you have kidney disease or are taking heart or blood pressure medicines, consult your doctor or pharmacist before use.

Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

Not for dehydration caused by diarrhoea. Use only as directed.

If symptoms persist talk to your health professional. Adults only.
Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

No added dairy, lactose, soy or yeast. Each tablet contains 144mg of sodium. Quantity of sodium per maximum daily adult dose is 1440mg.

Ingredients

Active ingredients per tablet:
Sodium Chloride 87.5mg, Potassium Chloride 149mg, Sodium Bicarbonate 390mg, Citric Acid 698mg, Glucose 1.87g.

Contains: Contains sucralose and sugars (Glucose).

Directions

How to use: Remove 2 tablets from the tube and replace the cap tightly. Dissolve tablets in 200mL of fresh cold drinking water (3 minutes). Sip slowly and frequently while symptoms persist. Discard any unused solution after 2 hours or 24 hours if refrigerated. Avoid mixing the product with cordial, juice, soft or sports drinks.

PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

Dosage: Adults: Take 2 tablets dissolved in 200mL of water, not exceeding a maximum daily dose of 10 tablets, or as directed by your health professional.

Start with 200mL of fresh water.
Add two VOOST, tablets & watch them fizz.
Once dissolved, it's ready to drink!
Experience the fizz!

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store tube tightly close in a cool, dry place. Store below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
